buildCommand: cd packages/ai && npm install --ignore-scripts --include=dev && npm run build && cd ../../ready-layer && node -e "var fs=require('fs'),p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8'));p.dependencies['@requiem/ai']='file:../packages/ai';fs.writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2))" && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npx next build
